body:
> You could make the same argument about some other packages in the standard library

Yes, some packages shouldn't have been in the standard library and the team regrets that. The current stance is to not add any more packages to the standard library unless they are a major benefit to the language and couldn't easily exist as a third party package.

Convenience and discovery are not convincing arguments. Installing a 3rd party dependency isn't very inconvenient, and godoc.org makes packages quite discoverable.
